sentences.en: At the same time air is sucked into the inlet to replace the exhausted air.
sentences.cn: 同时,外面空气由进气口吸入代替被排出的空气.

sentences.en: Both eliminators and inlet baffles are normally installed in a vertical position.
sentences.cn: 挡水板和异流片通常都是垂直安装.

sentences.en: However, for certain temperaturesensitive materials the inlet gas temperature must be lowered.
sentences.cn: 但是, 对于某些温度敏感的材料,进入的气体温度必须降低.

sentences.en: I mean to get into North Inlet, and beach her quietly there.'
sentences.cn: 我要将船驶进北汊,让它在那里平稳地登上岸滩. ”

sentences.en: Inlet gas humidification greatly influences the fuel cell performance and temperature distribution.
sentences.cn: 气体相对湿度对电池性能的影响很大.

sentences.en: Let's make the little air inlet under the front panels.
sentences.cn: 让我们使小进风口下阵线面板.

sentences.en: No tide flushes through this narrow inlet.
Some carburetors have an auxliary fuel valve and inlet.
sentences.cn: 有些化油器具有备用的燃油阀和入口.

sentences.en: The air pressure at the hot value inlet does not become excessively low.
sentences.cn: 在热风阀进口处的风压不要变得太低.

sentences.en: The engine - feed system interface is at the turbopump inlet flanges.
sentences.cn: 发动机与供应系统的交界是在涡轮泵的进口法兰盘处.

sentences.en: The fresh - air inlet was usually the crankcase breather cap.
sentences.cn: 新鲜空气进口一般是曲轴箱通气盖.

sentences.en: The large holes on the left and right represent the inlet and exhausting valve ports respectively.
sentences.cn: 左右两侧的两个大孔,分别表示进气阀孔和排气阀孔.

sentences.en: The surface of an inlet sways with nut - horns And weeds are lush along the Banks.
sentences.cn: 漾漾泛菱荇,澄澄映葭苇.

sentences.en: There are several sheltered inlets along the coast.
sentences.cn: 沿着海岸线有几处有天然屏障的水湾。

sentences.en: There are two feeding rotors near the inlet of heavy - duty crusher.
sentences.cn: 在重型破碎机的进口附近有两个给料辊.

sentences.en: Water will be observed draining from the inlet connection of the device.
sentences.cn: 从装置的进口连接处应该可以观察到水的排放.

words.tran_cn: [地理][通信]入口，[水利][机]进口；插入物

phrases.tran_cn: 入口温度；进气温度；进入温度
入口速度；进入速度；进口速度

trans.tran_cn: 进口，[电]引入，插入物，水湾
trans.tran_en: a narrow area of water that reaches from the sea or a lake into the land

trans.tran_cn: 引进; 嵌入; 插入;
